name: Robman
description:
Is it a Bird? Is it a Plane? No, it's RobMan, and he's here to steal all your money! But...Is it just a simple Pacman game? NO
It's Pacman, BUT WITH GUNS!!
Shoot the police, or don't, it's upto you.

PS: There are multiple endings to this game. Try to collect all the coins at least. Your every action has consequences. (Find all 7 endings)

Controls:
Arrow Keys to Move
Space to Shoot
Z to Interact/ Go to next Text/ Duck during Car Chase Minigame

Game made for Triple Trijam #1 Theme: Novel Twist on a Classic Game(Pac-Man) and Chain Reaction(Your actions change future endings)

Engine Used: GameMaker Studio 1.4
Spriting Software Used: Piskel

Time Taken (According to my timer)
Part 1: 2 hour 22 minutes
Part 2: 3 Hour 10 minutes
Part 3: 2 Hour 56 minutes
Plus 16 + 3 Minutes for Final Debugging

Total Time: 8 Hours and 47 minutes

Sprites and Programming made by me
Currently, there is no audio. Might add after the jam.

PPS: The cops and robbers theme has no relation to current events, please don't kill me.
